articles.author: Victor Goury-Laffont
articles.title: Ex-president Sarkozy faces house arrest in France after corruption charge upheld - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: French Supreme Court confirms sentence of three years, two of which will be suspended.
articles.content:
Sarkozy was sentenced to three years in jail, two of which were suspended.
He will now be summoned before a separate judge who will define the conditions under which the former French president, who… [+1048 chars]
